item.title: Glass recycling bin is overflowing, 2nd July
item.description:
Both glass recycling bins in Fairfield Road Car Park haven't been emptied for weeks and are overflowing causing smashed glass in the car park

item.title: Always fly tipping / rubbish on Crossways, 2nd July
item.description:
This is a constant issue and is not removed quickly enough. It is a busy footway and this ruins the neighbourhood. Can I sign be put up here to deter?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crossway, Hackney, London

item.title: Litter all across Bournemouth Road, 2nd July
item.description:
Litter all across the street including broken glass which has been here for days. I wish Southwark would employ as many street cleaners as there are Parking Enforcement Officers. There are several on Bournemouth Road daily but no sign of a street cleaner!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Bournemouth Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
